location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from James Morley, East India Company Resident at Bushire, and his assistant, George Green, to Captain Thomas Farmer, acting Commander in Chief of the Company's Cruizers off Carrack [Kharg]

mods.abstract: Having received deserters from Kharg at Bushire, the author of this letter relays their reports that Meer Mahanna [MÄ«r Muhanna] plans to attack the Bombaygrab, and that many people on Kharg are inclined to desert but are fearful of English reprisals.
